entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 10:53 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 10:53 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022
